channel.title: CVE Feed for Cayin Technology -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cayin Technology -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7728|2024-08-14T13:51:41.394Z -- cayin%20technology -- cms-se%2822.04%29
item.description: The specific CGI of the CAYIN Technology CMS does not properly validate user input, allowing a remote attacker with administrator privileges to inject OS commands into the specific parameter and execute them on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-7728|2024-08-14T03:53:12.781Z -- cayin%20technology -- cms-se%2822.04%29
item.description: The specific CGI of the CAYIN Technology CMS does not properly validate user input, allowing a remote attacker with administrator privileges to inject OS commands into the specific parameter and execute them on the remote server.

item.title: CVE-2024-7729|2024-08-14T03:52:43.673Z -- cayin%20technology -- smp-2100
item.description: The CAYIN Technology CMS lacks proper access control, allowing unauthenticated remote attackers to download arbitrary CGI files.
